name: Popplio

evolution.description: Popplio can evolve into Brionne at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 8 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Sea Lion Pokémon. The balloons it inflates with its nose grow larger and larger as it practices day by day.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Liquid Voice
abilities.description: Any sound-based move activated by this Pokémon is water-type.
